metadata.title: CVE-2021-34121 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An Out of Bounds flaw was discovered in htmodoc 1.9.12 in functionparse_tree() in toc.cxx, this possibly leads to memory layout informationleaking in the data. This might be used in a chain of vulnerability inorder to reach code execution.

criterions.comment: htmldoc package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
